column5: You have failed on the road to oneness with the internet Grasshopper.  read me for help
I dont even know how to make that one work.  Go to photo bucket and make an account.  Get back to us when you do. The steps are easy after that.
all he did was put the link (pathway) to the photo on his computer , which is on his desktop  he has to up load it to a server on the internet
You know all this tec stuff.and cant make a boat run.
yeah there is too much puter and tec stuff crammed into my head..no room left for important stuff like fixing boats and how not to break things

You can do it straight from your desktop. Go to where you normally post here, use the FULL EDITOR, click on browse, select the photo you want from your computer (desktop), click "open" then click on "Attach this file". Then click "add reply". Try it now...see how it works.
